quotes.quote: I have great faith in fools self-confidence my friends will call it.
Don't live down to expectations. Go out there and do something remarkable.
They can do all because they think they can.
If you doubt yourself, then indeed you stand on shaky ground.
The man of genius inspires us with a boundless confidence in our own powers.
Don't let others put thoughts into your mind that takes away your self-confidence.
The difference between successful people and really successful people is that really successful people say no to almost everything.
One important key to success is self-confidence. An important key to self-confidence is preparation.
Nothing builds self-esteem and self-confidence like accomplishment.
Whether you think you can or think you can't â€“ you are right.
Once we believe in ourselves, we can risk curiosity, wonder, spontaneous delight, or any experience that reveals the human spirit.
It is confidence in our bodies, minds and spirits that allows us to keep looking for new adventures.
The way you treat yourself sets the standard for others.
Assertiveness is not what you do, it's who you are.
Men give their confidence at once, but never their money.
The moment you doubt whether you can fly, you cease for ever to be able to do it.
It's not who you are that holds you back, it's who you think you're not.
Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will
Confidence is knowing who you are and not changing it a bit because of someone's version of reality is not your reality.
Don't let anyone steal your dream. It's your dream, not theirs.
Always be yourself, express yourself have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it.
With realization of one's own potential and self-confidence in one's ability, one can build a better world.
Trust yourself. You know more than you think you do.
To be passive is to let others decide for you. To be aggressive is to decide for others. To be assertive is to decide for yourself. And to trust that there is enough, that you are enough.
To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
Confidence is like a dragon where, for every head cut off, two more heads grow back.
Self-confidence grows on trees, in other people's orchards.
Life marks us all down, so it's just as well that we start out by overpricing ourselves.
Confidence comes not from always being right but from not fearing to be wrong.
If you haven't confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life. With confidence, you have won even before you have started.
As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
The way to develop self-confidence is to do the thing you fear and get a record of successful experiences behind you.
Assertiveness is most effective when least applied.
To be around someone whose self-confidence is more than what our first glance led us to expect is seductive.
Make the most of yourself, for that is all there is of you.
Confidence is preparation. Everything else is beyond your control.
Being assertive in the home does not produce any smiling faces, but it does bring out a few tongues.
Calm self-confidence is as far from conceit as the desire to earn a decent living is remote from greed.
Confidence is always the best accessory. Own the moment. Own your space.
